reviews.review_msg: Dr. Chin was a decent prof. Her exams are very specific and require recalling random facts. Aside from the unnecessary difficulty of exams she is actually really good at explaining difficult concepts and makes herself accessible outside of class help over email in her own time. Attend class as she gives hints as to what will be on the exam.

This was Dr. Chin's first time teaching MBB 321, and I think she did it very well. She drops LOTS of hints for the exams during lecture. She makes it very clear what you need to do to do well on the exam.
